reviews.review: Игра очень хорошая и атмосферная (играйте ночью), рекоменую людям у которых всегда найдутся 3-4 друга для игры , т.к рандомные игроки порой не умеют играть вообще или они думаю только о себе. Когда вас поймают на крюк, только друзья помогу, единицы рандомных людей, которые спасут вас. На длительное время игра не затягивает, слишком однотипный геймплей, возможно разработчики свою идею усовершенствуют. Советую любителям таких игр как: outlast, the forest и тд... Разработчикам отдельный респект, каждый день выходят апдейты и игра не стоит на месте. Когда я начал играть в DbD система поиска для выживания  с друзьями работала отвратительно, но на следующий день вышел патч и всё стало работать отлично, всем советую поиграть!

Por favor hagan algo para que cuando quede un solo superviviente no pueda esconderse toda la partida.. me han tocado supervivientes que cuando se abre la trampilla y le quedan varios motores se esconden en un armario y se van afk... un día encontre uno por casualidad y ahí descubri lo que hacian.. sali de una partida despues de más de media hora buscandolo donde el que quedaba ni fue a la trampilla ni reparo motores ni nada, esa gente arruina el juego hace falta algo!

[h1] Glance overview [u] 65% Yes/35% No [/u] [/h1]

[b]TL:DR
Worth playing with friends, expect some bugs, some can get you stuck unable to move at all(happens rarely, only 2 times since game was released for me personally, with all my hours put into it), lag can spoil it easily, test for it as described below. Some people are not team players in a team based game so yea, best with known friends...[b]

[b] This team of developers seem to make some really questionable choices at times, be warned... [/b]

[B] The negative [b]
If you want a bug free completely developed and most importantly,if you value your sanity, DO NOT BUY THIS GAME. Some of the patches seem untested upon release, seen by breaking already working mechanics already present in the game, for everyone. Broken aspects rear their head more often than I'd like but it is improving, they are working on it, it is most certainly not dead. A huge problem is though, the killer becomes the host, if his internet is shitty for whatever reason, the lag can ruin the game for you. You can test it sort of after entering the lobby, you'll quickly see someone spamming a letter or number, they are testing the response times.

[i] [b] The positive [b]

This game is meant to be played with friends, getting 3 others together (teamspeak/discord/skype is highly recomeneded) and facing a killer can really be fun, UNLESS the killer is camping. If you manage to get 5 people together, yourself included [b] you can change your steam download region [b], only the killer and the one inviting friends need to do so, find a secluded place, easily matched against eachother. Worth mentioning is the developers are still activly adding content and fixing bugs almost a year after release, yea, those other companies who just drop a pile of s.h.i.t. on you and never fix anything, they know who they are.
With friends I'd most certainly recommend it, solo can become a problem at times.

Best of luck
love the idea of this game. very fun with friends. good game

Grabbed this yesterday and been having an absolute blast. I've only had one or two problems getting into a game. Even then they were only like 2-3 seconds to hit the join button again. Not a real problem. De4vs have also stated that a patch is incoming to fix said problem. 

I love the tension this game builds. Its different every time you play!

It's Really Fun. My First Game as a Survivor i managed to survive Long enough for survivors and Monster to disconnect or ragequit. What happened was We unfortunetly let one of our people die and the 4th person disconnect at the start of the game putting us as a disadvantage. This mode was honestly horrifying to me yet thrilling at the same time. I decided to give the Killers a Go and i definetly Learned alot from the High Lvl Survivors. Even though Monsters can pick survivors up, another survivor if brave enough can flash the light to temporary stun the Monster. Since the Monster is 1st person viewpoint he won't get to really see where they went except to corner of his/her eye perhaps and following the scratch marks survivors make from running. Also Even If the Monster Hangs one of the survivors, the more bold and veteran players WILL risk their lives to save their comrades. I had the weird experience of having one taken off and i swing at the savior and hang him instead while the one that escaped got away. Another time i managed to attack the savior b4 he/she got to get the one I hanged off. At this point there was 1 survivor left and she was a high lvl that had some sprint perk and managed to escape. normally when you have 1 person hanging and about to hang the other one there is a chance the other survivors will save that hanged person. Even though i sometimes lose to high lvl players I at least sacrifice 1 person which earns me blood points. I also learn from these other survivors how to be Very good cooperative survivors. I wish i could say the Wraith is OP because of the ability to cloak but that bell ringing when he needs to phase in and out of invisibility just to hit a survivor is a dead give away and they end up running when they hear it. This is gonna be a fun year for me. 10/10

In my most recent match as the killer the survivors happened to be a 4 man survive with friends. maybe even a 3 man. I knew this because during the game the 3 players were messing around with me and were hiding poorly. They thought I was some casual killer (I actually am too perhaps even a baby killer) But I've watched enough videos and use my ears to hear my surroundings too. They were too altriustic so they kept saving each other and were always close by. Once one of them did the tea bag while I was breaking the pallet out of being over confident I started to tunnel. Managed to sacrifice all 3 of them and then I Freeze. so I take this moment to take a break and come back to find it was a Crash. I know Dead by Daylight doesn't do this, it was more likely the player might have ddos or intentionally crashed the game so I wouldn't get anything out of it and because they were salty. I log back in to try to find their profiles via Shift+Tab and find their names don't show up as if they didn't exist. It might be time to bring in some A.I. Killers and A.I. Survivors because apparently people get salty when they lose to other players and go so far as to greif/hack and sabotage gameplay for killers and probably survivors alike. I like this game alot too but then I find I lost my offering  which wasn't a big loss but it was still an item I earned with my time and effort and apparently that match still counted enough for me to lose it while the crybabies got a free pass to keep being toxic. I was mad before but with patience and just playing the game as it is, I realized I just gotta enjoy it whenever I can and brush off the negatives. but all in all this is still a fun game to play. Just gotta be a sportsman and take defeat like a real player and also figure out ways to beat the killer when he camps or just try to escape. in killer perspective if they gen rush to 3 or less quickly they figure it's time to camp and start killing people ASAP. depends really though. most of us just play killer ofr the rituals yet continue to play as survivors, or we're killers and play survivors casually.
Добавьте поддержку руля!

Ok so this will be the first game I have bothered to write a review for. For now my opinion is the game is not worth recommending. I have played four rounds as a survivor so far. My first match, the very first time I have played the game I was pited against a rank ONE killer with rare perks out the whazoo. That match lasted all of two through three minutes before we were all brutally killed. The second match was only a rank thriteen killer so we managed to last about five minutes. I do intend to continue playing as it is fun but if this trend continues I may stop.

The game while extremely fun and visually nice is ruined by the terrible matchmaking system. So as it stands I cannot and will not recommend it. Should they ever decide to rework the matchmaking in a resaonable way I will then recommend the game.

Devs if you bother reading the reviews or discussion boards at all please listen to us when we are asking for a better match making system. I really do like the game but when you are dead in a minute or two from a max level killer it kind of puts a bad taste in your mouth.

Но. Оптимизация рушит всё.    Она исчезает. Пропадает. Карты могут фризить и лагать после обновления графики. Баги тоже могут случиться. Разработчики , обновите пожалуйста игру не только графически и косметически , добавьте не только контент.Сделайте напор на оптимизацию , позязя.

When I first watched this game on twitch I wasn't a fan at all.. I thought what's the point if all you do is run from the killer and not be able to kill him.. After playing a few hours during the free weekend you realize there is a huge amount of teamwork that goes into it.. Playing with friends is an insane blast and if you are solo playing as the killer is fun as hell as well.. There is MUCH more to the progression than I ever realized and you get quite a bit of bloodcoins (used for progression) acquired every match.. All in all I think the game is great and I'm glad the free to play weekend got me into it otherwise I would have never given it a chance.. THERE was an issue with the matchmaking but they fixed most of the issues and I'm sure will furthermore improve on it.. I'll be purchasing it and with the price tag at $17 til tomorrow it's a steal in my opinion..

Hallo

Ich hatte schon lange ein Auge auf das Spiel und habe mich daher sehr gefreut als
ich gesehen habe, das man es über das Wochenende austesten kann bevor ich mich dazu
entschließe das Spiel zu kaufen.
Ich bin echt froh das mit Steam das ermöglicht hat, da ich es nur von Let´s Plays kannte
und es da einen guten Eindruck hinterlies. Ich musste jedoch schmerzlich feststellen das 
ohne es mit Freunden zu spielen, es einfach keinen Spaß macht. Kommen wir zu denn positiven
Punkte:
- Die Atmosphäre ist echt gelungen
- Die Grafik passt und fängt die Stimmung sehr gut ein
- Sound passt auch super
Woran mag es also liegen das ich es nicht kaufen werden:
- Levelunterschiede (Perks), man sieht sich als Neuling teilweise Hoffnungslos überlegenen Mitspielern
und wie in meinem Fall, Jäger, gegenüber und sieht in 10 Runden einfach nur denn Haken wieder.
- Mitspieler. Ich weiss dafür kann das Spiel nix, aber es ist nunmal ein MP Titel und wenn man 
in ne Lobby kommt, nett: Hi; schreibt und immer nur Zahlen von 1-4 gepostet werden wer noch nicht rdy ist, zeugt nicht von Teamplay -.-
Das nächste ist auch einfach das im Team niemand hilft, sei es am Haken, beim reparieren der Generatoren oder sonstiges.
- Auch wurde die Anzahl der Generatoren erhöht, man musste vorher 4 aktivien und jetzt sind es 5, was einem Spiel, wo Teamplay kaum herrscht, einfach unmöglich macht. 2 habe ich alleine immer geschafft und mehr wurden es auch weil der Rest irgendwas anderes gemacht hat.
- Das ständige warten auf ein Spiel und das man immer nach einer Fehlsuche die Suche neu starten muss.
Fazit:
Für Leute mit fester Gruppe ist es echt Spaßig und in Team bestimmt richtig gut, als Solospieler bzw wo in der Freundisliste alle unterschiedliche Games spielen ist man in dem Spiel hoffnungslos verloren und das hochspielen bis zu denn guten Sachen dauert einfach ewig (10 Runden für lvl 1 auf 2)

Здравствуйте дорогие друзья,сегодня мы поговорим о такой игре,как Dead by Daylight.
У этой игры очень хорошая задумка,но реалезация...Оставляет желать лучшего.
За все мое время в игре,а это около 100 часов(достатачно нормальный период для данной игры,я понял,что Dead by Daylight - один большой,багованный кусок говна.
Здесь ужасно все : геймплей,аудио составляющая,комюнити.
Стоит просто зайти в игру,как уже начнутся проблемы с багами.Баги абсалютно несовместимы с игрой.Начиная с застревания в текстурах заканчивая  вылетоми за пределы карты.
Геймплей - изначальный геймлей однообразен,но его разбавляют неистывые баги.
Аудио состовляющая - вся в багах.Когда ты лечишь союзника,звук как-будто ты чинишь генератор.
Комьюнити - море неадекватных людей,уйма школьников(куда же без них).Играя за маньяка,после добавления чата после игры,можно узнать о себе много всего интересного.Если ты играешь в соло за выжевшего,и если ты не дай бог попадешься, и маньяк тебя повесит - больше будет шанс,что ты вручную выберешься с крюка,чем тебя с него спасут.
Графика - она особо не важна для этой игры,ты не успеваешь "насладится" ей во время всей этой суеты.
Итоги : вообщем игра АБСАЛЮТНО сырой контент и АБСАЛЮТНО не стоит своих денег.
Это одна из худчших игр,которые я преобретал.
Закреплю свой обзор скриншотами из моей коллекции :

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=748938931

[b]Introduction[/b]

I've been playing Dead by Daylight since 20th August 2016 and I've clocked over 2,000 hours in the game. I've had a thorough experience with both sides (Killer and Survivor), so I thought I'd leave my thoughts here. There are probably hundreds of other reviews entailing the basics, but I'll go a bit deeper.

[b]Killer[/b]

The more skill-based side of the two. If you're a person who enjoys feeling pressured to use your skills and abilities, Killer is probably for you. Killer gameplay entails many different things such as mindgames (using your knowledge of the game's mechanics and predictions of movement to outwit a Survivor), map control (pressuring multiple Generators and/or Survivors at once), power skill (using the Killer's power ability to your advantage) and time management (self-explanatory). There is a large variety of Killers at your disposal, all with different powers that work in different ways and are stronger in different areas. My personal favourite is the Huntress as she is the most skill-based Killer of all of them, requiring perfect aim, precision, knowledge of the relationship between how long the hatchet is charged and where it lands, etc. However, Killer can be very difficult to learn and there are more skilled Survivors than skilled Killers, so naturally people feel demotivated to play Killer. As odd as it may sound, if you are struggling to get to grips with Killer, keep playing Survivor. The better you get at Survivor, the better you get at Killer because there are a lot of situations as Killer where you have to put yourself in the Survivors' shoes. Having knowledge of these situations will help you in the long run. Furthermore, ignore people who tell you to use and don't use what they want. Will you get flamed for it? Probably. Should you care? No. You're still learning, and it's all a part of the process. I find watching guides on YouTube can really help, such as those from OhTofu, Otzdarva or Scott Jund.

My personal thoughts on Killer are although it can be a lot of fun (and, in the case of a Huntress main, VERY SATISFYING), there are a lot of games where I don't have fun and I feel hopeless. This is due to sweaty games where Survivors just rush Generators, giving me no chance. This is normal, and in the end, you shouldn't expect to win every game.

[b]Survivor[/b]

If you prefer a more casual playstyle and like co-operative gameplay, Survivor may be for you. I don't have much to say about Survivor, but if there is one thing I can recommend, don't play solo if you cannot defend yourself. You're going to have a bad time. Your best bet is playing Survive With Friends as you can learn the ropes with the backup of your buddies to help you. Although some Killers play fairly, there are a lot of Killers who do not. For example, some Killers will happily chase a different person every time, not bring any overpowered addons [i]cough[/i] Iridescent Head [i]cough[/i] forever Freddy [i]cough[/i] and not bring moris. However, there are Killers who take pride in doing so, and as Survivor, communication is key to surviving in these situations. Similarly to Killer, there are plenty of tutorials for Survivor on YouTube.

My personal thoughts on Survivor are I tend to not have as much fun as Survivor because there's not as much skill involved and I don't like the feeling of not having control over who is killed and whatnot. However, I think with friends, it's a lot more fun and chill.

[b]Conclusion[/b]

There's a lot to this game, and even more so with the addition of the Archives. Every match can have a billion outcomes: it just depends on the choices the players make. Although it's had its ups and downs, Dead by Daylight always comes around to be a fun time in the end.

This game is buggy, yes. The ranking system is not the best, yes. Community is kinda toxic. But let's face the fact, most of the games have these features. 

What people fail to realize is that this game just got released and the people working on it are doing their very best, by working hard on their weekends to make us all happy. Sure sometimes the games can be frustrating but it is still fun. 

TLDR; Game is fun to play despite negative aspects. I am going to enjoy this journey of witnessing the game getting better each patch. The fun will remain and the negative aspects will eventually go away.

For this game I recommend drinking a 2016 Trader Joe's Charles Shaw Chardonnay. The Charles Shaw boasts organically grown grapes or something. To be honest I wasn't really paying attention to the back of the label while I was using that McDonald's toilet. This "organically grown" stuff tastes as about as complex as a wet dish clothe and as natural as synethic motor oil. As such it will contrast and compliment the complexity of this game.
It's weird. Such a simple premise. People being hunted by killers in a closed map. The victims need to repair generators or invest in bitcoin in order to escape. The killers have to capture and hook the victims. But then you have all these witchcraft offerings and whatnot being given to some guy or god or whoever, possibly Santa. These offerings will hopefully help the offerer. I know that if i was a guy or a god or a Santa I'd want cookies and/or cake for my offerings.
What was more painful than being skewered on a hook was having all of my favourite perks nerfed. It's like they want the killers to win or something. It won't seem so bad but its a real seesaw of opponents. You'll face the same pro three times in a row and then meet some noob who will tank harder than the bitcoin the victims invested in.
Lastly I must say that I've never liked a game which will bring out a hundred different DLCs. DLC prices should have a cap of something like $2 across all games.
In conclusion I'd like to say that its important to stay hydrated.
Teamwork sucks !

When you by some miracle or satanic sacrifice manage to play it's an ok game, it'll keep you entertained for a couple of hours, however the game is nothing special.

I give it a MEH/10 (that's like a 5 or something, meh)

В общем игра хорошая. Есть баги, недочёты. Разрабы что-то делают. Выжившие бегают от маньяка, а маньяк сажает их на крюки. Развиваться долго, но пока развиваешься у тебя появляются навыки и играть становится легче. Очень атмосферно! Рекомендую!

P.s. Оптимизация ещё не очень

Ich finde dieses Spiel super! Ja, es gibt Bugs aber die werden meistens behoben und für mich nicht sonderlich störend.
Ich habe hier gelesen, dass der Killer OP sei.. Nein, das stimmt nicht (nicht in jedem Fall)! Es kommt auf den Spieler an der den Killer spielt, genauso bei den Überlebenden.
Das DLC, welches man sich kostenlos herunterladen kann, ist an sich ganz gut (neuer Killer (Nurse) und einen neuen Suvivor). Die Nurse ist minimal OP. Vorallem bei Ihr kommt es auf den Spieler an, der sie spielt. Gute Spieler werden mit ihr besser und schlechte noch schlechter. Da ist Übungssache gefragt.
Ab und zu hat das Matchmaking seine Probleme, z.B. kommen Level 1 Überlebende (die keine Perks haben) mit einem Level 15+ Killer zusammen (der Rang spielt für mich hierbei eher weniger eine Rolle). Das ist schei*e. Aber ich hoffe, dass das gefixt wird.
Mir macht sehr viel Spaß dieses Spiel zu spielen. Mir wird auch nach einiger Zeit nicht langweilig in dem Spiel, obwohl das Spielprinzip es vermuten lässt.
4 Überlebende, die 5 Generatoren reparieren müssen und noch ein Tor öffnen müssen und ein Killer, der sie jagt und töten will. Und selbst wenn nur noch einer lebt und noch mehrere Generatoren repariert werden müssen, gibt es eine Luke für den Überlebenden durch die er fliehen kann. Also es gibt eigentlich immer eine Chance zu überleben. Aber am besten überlebt man, wenn man als TEAM arbeitet, was leider nicht immer funktioniert, wenn man mit anderen, unbekannten Überlebenden spielt.
Aber dennoch kann ich dieses Spiel nur empfehlen!

(FREE WEEKEND REVIEW!)



So This is a "free weekend review" and in short the time that I played dead by daylight was thoroughly enjoyed.

I didn't have any issues with finding matches but I hear allot of people did/do have them.
(Maybe it's a regional thing? or maybe the issues are now fixed?)

At any rate This game "for me" had allot of good things going for it Horror being the paramount.
The game is fun and kept me entertained and yes I am now interested in purchasing the game. 
(On sale mind you)

do I believe the game is worth it's current price tag?... No. Not really. Or not yet? 

Many people's review of the game reflect In this game being "still early access" and I felt some real weight from those claims after playing it. Now that's not to say the game isn't pretty damned entertaining in it's current state but to say it's not missing palpable content just doesn't feel right.

Anyway I did have fun with the game but I just didnt feel it was totally a finished product. 

bugs? a few ones now and again. I actually couldn't run the game without crashing on ultra settings and my machines a beast. Other than that there are a few here and there but nothing that ive found to be game breaking.

In closing I would recommend this game to others so long as they don't have issues with matchmaking and are ok with early access-Esque titles.
JUEGAZO

[h1]中文版[/h1]

第一次玩时给我留下深刻印象的就是他的氛围。从BGM到特效音，紧张的心跳，越修越响的电机声，都会让新手玩家不断冒冷汗。

新的章节和服装DLC也是在不断发布中，非常好的一点是制作组明确表明了任何一个DLC不会影响到游戏的平衡性，十分公平。

总体来说，作为一个小公司做的游戏，已经是很不错了，虽然经过了十余个版本之后，还是有很多问题，不过制作组的确也一直在努力修复平衡性和Bug。[spoiler]虽然有时并不令人满意[/spoiler]

[b]7.5/10[/b]

Generally, it is pretty well done by a small company. Although there're still quite many problems to solve after over 10 versions, devs have been working hard on fixing bugs and balance. [spoiler]Though sometimes not very satisfying[/spoiler]

Дуайт, этот персонаж является чут ли не символом игры.

Если ты спас Дуайта и тебя поймали, он убежит чинить гениратор.

Если ты остался только с ним в живых он будет ждать твоей смерти,а потом ушмыгнёт в люк.

Если вы увидели Дуайта за выжившего, бегите со всех ног от него и ни в коем случае не спасайте его(разве что, если он помог вам до этого, то можно сделать исключение)

За убийцу же против Дуайта делать специального(перки или подношения) нинадо, у него самые безобидные перки по сравнению с другими. Его правда очень весело гнать ссаными тряпками и вешать первым на крюк.

9 ссанных Дуайтов из 10

Review zu Dead by Daylight (270h+)

Dead by Daylight ist ein 4vs1 Horror Multiplayer Spiel.


4 unbewaffnete Überlebende gegen eine Mörderischen Horrorfilm Killer, das ganze noch auf Düsteren Schauplätzen. Klingt einfach? Wäre da nicht die Tatsache, das erst 5 Generatoren angeschalten werden müssen, um die Stromversorgen für die Ausgangstore zu erzeugen.


Was kann das Spiel?

In der Version 1.2.1 bietet das Grundspiel 3 Karten (+2 DLC Karten) und 3 Killer (+2 DLC Killer).
Dazu kommen 4 Überlebende (+2 DLC Überlebende) und eine vielzahl an frei Kombinierbaren Perks,Items und Extras. 
Abseits vom Level und Ranking Mode gibt es einen Töte deine Freunde Modus, welcher es Erlaubt eine Private Runde zuspielen.

Welche Schwächen hat das Spiel?
Kleinere Balancing Schwächen
Kein faires Matchmaking (Rang 20 mit Rang 1 vermischt)
Kleinere Bugs
Kleinere Wartezeiten

Fazit: Für mich klar das Geld wert, obwohl es ein paar kleinere Fehler gibt.

Nerf the Nurse


also fix matchmaking

[h1]Всем наркоманам,любящим пощекотать свои нервы,добрый привет.[/h1]

Значится,спасибо разработчикам за фри-уикенд,были некоторые сомнения перед покупкой игры,но после того как дали бесплатно попробовать,игра мне зашла,сейчас я напишу,что в ней есть хорошего,ну и плохого тоже добавлю.

Начнём с того,что если вы любитель атмосферных хорроров,типа Outlast,или Amnesia,вам явно понравится эта игра,ибо я думал,какая нахрен атмосфера может быть в ОНЛАЙН хоррор игре? Но я ошибался,расскажу почему.

 Адреналин,чувство страха,паника,всё это тут вам обеспечено,а так же горящий пердак от нубо-тиммейтов,да-да,тут они тоже есть.Это то самое чувство,когда маньяк вешает тебя на крюк,уходит за другими выжившими... А буквально напротив в кустах,сидит твой напарник,и смотрит как ты ебашишь по пробелу,сопротивляясь,и нихуя не делает,ммм,найс.
Перки,прокачка персонажей,в игру можно реально уйти на несколько дней,вам захочется понять здесь всё,качатся,качатся и качатся,как петушки спортсмены в моём дворе,только вы будете качатся в игре,ну поняли да.Вы круче чем они,у вас будет 50 лвл,а у них всего лишь мышечная масса средней нормы.

В игре пока,мало режимов,и не так что бы было много карт,но это нисколько не надоест вам,уверяю. В игре можно и повеселится,играя за маньяка,ну или за выжившего,и бегать от маньяка по всей карте,как ёбнутый наркоман,ну да,немного не по канону игры,но ведь это весело.А ведь в  игры мы играем,хочу заметить ради удовольствия,ко-ко.

Впринципе,за свои деньги,очень годный продукт,единственное что меня расстраивает,это баги,их тут реально очень много.А так же сетевой код игры,который тоже любит повыёбыватся время от времени.Ну и еще,чего я боюсь,как бы игру не погубил донат,уже много хороших проектов,скатились из-за этих сраных микротранзакций.

У меня всё,всем пасиб кто прочёл мой обзор до конца,надеюсь я помог вам,в решении покупать эту игру или нет =)

dead by daylight is a awsome game i really hope it can come to consle.
The game is alright

Do not think this review is bashing the game because it is not i loved the game up until the recent updates this august. I do have 100+ hours played in the game & i am by no means a noob my highest rank on survivor writing this review is level 4 with 1 pip. Also do not go ahead thinking the only reason i got to this rank was infinite glitches because i have never used one nor do i know about them but i do watch people stream on twitch and hear a lot of talk in chat about them.

This game was fun until the recent game update in august, the killers are way too overpowered now.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
Perks that are overpowered & all killers use:
"Spies from the shadows, iron grasp, deer stalker, no one escapes from death" are too overpowered and need a nerf or the killers perks need to start having a cooldown like survivors do. On top of it most of them carry the four perks i mentioned above which just makes them overpowered.

Problems with killers: 
They hit you with their weapon after you have already jumped through a window there weapon goes through the window and hits you puts you down on the ground after hitting you for the second time of course. The killer walks way to fast & catches up to you in very little time. This gives you no time to escape at all. The killers speed should be nerfed i am not saying all killers but certain classes should walk slower in this game, which i will list in each killers review. Every killer in the game has auto aim which is terrible according to dead by daybreak "it’s a bug". I would say 75% of the time when i hit a killer with the pallet i end up getting hit by them. Then they end up on the same side of the pallet as me as well. Their attack range also needs a nerf all too many times i get hit when i am so far away from the killer which is crap.

Problems with killer’s items:
The Trapper - His traps are to overpowered now since you can no longer sabotage them unless you disarm them first & by the time you do that he already notices that you have disarmed the trap and heads towards your direction giving you no time to sabotage the trap meaning the only traps you will be able to get rid of are the ones he has not picked up and set on the ground. They need to reduce the speed that the trapper runs to give you more of a chance in the game or reduce the time it takes to disarm a trap & sabotage it. Also they need to take the auto aim off the killers. The trapper should not be able to place traps underneth people on the hook it is to overpowered and does not give you team member enough time to disarm and take the person off the hook.

Hill Billy - His chainsaw lets him run halfway across the map or more, it is also a one hit kill once he hit you, you are instantly down on the ground waiting to be hooked. Because not only can he run really fast plus far with his chainsaw he can walk fast and catch up to you quick even if he misses. This would not be such a big issue if his walking speed was nerfed to something more reasonable.
Also they need to take the auto aim off the killers.

Nurse - Her teleport is to accurate mixed with the auto aim attack for the killers she is way overpowered, i would have to say she is the worst person to play against you do not want to play in a match against her at all let's just say your team is like an insta kill. She is broken & needs a nerf. They need to take the auto aim off and reduce the range of her attack also make her slower she walks to fast. Also they need to take the auto aim off the killers.

Wraith - He is not really overpowered a pain to play against but he is most likely the easiest to play against this patch. He deserves the extra speed since he does not have any killer items like traps, teleport, or a chainsaw that lets you run super far at a fast pace. i do not have much to say about the wraith except for his attack range is pretty out there and might need some small tweaking. Also they need to take the auto aim off the killers.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Problems with surviving in the game:
The only escape from the killer that you have in the game is hitting them directly with a pallet to stun them which is pretty close to impossible since this game is player to player based and the connection is always the killers so he has the advantage in every single game. Example: "lag is a survivor killer & the killer never has that problem". The flash light is useless if anything in the game deserves an auto aim this because it never works when you shine it in their eyes to begin with they just walk right up to you and hit you. Besides the pallets being risky and the flash light being useless, this game needs to come up with more ways to get away from the killer.

About Survivor perks:
I do not find the survivor perks to be overpowered although there is a lot of discussion about them not being teachable to other classes because people would rather them be unique to each class.

Bugs in the game for survivor:
When a survivor on your team is on the floor bleeding out in the game there highlighted body will disappear & you will no longer be able to see where they are which is annoying when you are trying to help your team member, this bug will also happen when your team member is on the hook. i am not sure if this is a bug but its annoying when you think your team member is hit once only to find out he is thrown on top of a killers shoulder being carried to a hook. Killers still glitches through pallets and hitting you. Dead by daylight needs to fix healing when you are bleeding out on the floor if your whole team is on the floor and the killer is leaving you there to heal up all the way you should be able to heal up the rest of the way so you can contunie playing the game it is pointless to heal up all the way if no one is left to help you. To many times have i laid on the ground as the last person to bleed out and die with no help no way to get up this needs to be fixed.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I think this wraps up my review on Dead by Daylight. if you can put up with all the bugs & glitches and the unbalanced gameplay Dead By Daylight is still a good game but it needs a lot of work before it is completely finished. I hope this helps before you decide to purchase the game.
